Description:
Renovated delighted on massive 645sqm.
Renovated delighted on massive 645sqm.
Situated in the heart of Cranbourne is this perfect opportunity to find the space you have been looking for. Ideal for first home buying craving extra room or developer/investor with ability to sub divide STCA.
- Large driveway with double garage at the rear
- Renovated kitchen & Bathroom
- Massive outdoor entertainment area
Located only a short distance away from all your lifestyle needs including Cranbourne train station, primary and secondary schooling, multiple shopping centers and easy access to major road including Monash freeway.
Call us today to arrange a private inspection!

Description:
Excellent unit in great central location!
(1P3460) This beautiful unit is situated in a quiet street within a few minutes
walk to everything in the Cranbourne township.
The unit offers a huge lounge, well appointment kitchen.2 good size bedrooms,
a lovely laundry, single garage plus plenty of other extras and inclusions.
Set on a good size allotment of 404m this unit without doubt is one of the best value properties that we've had to offer for quite some time so call quickly.

Description:
Call Matt Dewan on 0416 638 019 to book a private inspection
Light-filled spaces, modern updates and picture-perfect poolside entertaining ensure this fabulous residence delivers superior family living, whilst benefitting from an ultra-convenient locale that the whole family is sure to love.
- Three robed bedrooms featuring plantation shutters, including master suite complemented by ensuite effect family bathroom, further served by a separate toilet and updated laundry
- Inviting lounge room adorned with plantation shutters and attractive modern flooring
- Stone topped kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, connecting to the adjoining meals zone
- Covered alfresco zone and sun-splashed deck provides the ideal vantage point for parents to oversee their children playing in the tidy backyard and gated swimming pool
- Gas heating, split system air conditioning, garden shed plus remote-controlled double carport
Nestled in a superbly central location, moments from Rangebank Primary, Cranbourne West Primary, Cranbourne Secondary, buses, Cranbourne Train Station, local shops, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, plus major road arterials.
Photo ID is required at the open homes

Description:
Central Location & Exceptional Value!
Location is key, situated within walking distance to Centro Cranbourne Shopping Centre, Primary & Secondary Schools, Train Station and bus stops is this fantastic opportunity not to be missed!
Set on a neat group of only 2 units, it is perfect for downsizers, investors or those entering the market. Boasting 3 spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, an open plan family/meals area and kitchen with ample bench & cupboard space.
A low maintenance block with terrace and double carport complete the package. This property represents great value and as such will not last long - CALL TODAY to arrange your inspection!

Description:
SINGLE LEVEL DELIGHT
Located in a secluded and well maintained estate and under 5 years old.
A low maintenance home suiting first home buyers, downsizers or investors.
Tiled from entry right through to the kitchen, dining & living. Well sized master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe and sizable shower. Square set cornices throughout an open living area and neat private yard.
Some of the features include:
- gas ducted heating
- large split system in lounge (cooling + heating)
- stone bench tops in kitchen and bathroom
- stainless steel appliances including dishwasher
- ensuite and walk in robe to master bedroom
- tiled shower bases
- double garage with internal access
- 1 x solar panel with gas booster for hot water
Currently leased to an excellent tenant. Can suit both an investor who would like to have a tenant in place from day 1 or an owner occupier who wishes to have vacant possession.
PLEASE NOTE: If you have recently returned from overseas or transited through China, Italy, Iraq or South Korea in the past 14 days, had contact with someone suspected or confirmed with Coronavirus or have a fever, sore throat, cough or shortness of breath. Please do not attend viewings in the best interest of the General public.
Internal area
168.25m²

Description:
Property Available For Private Inspection Call Michelle Stephens 0417352644
Live the dream in this perfectly presented family home set on a large land bock measuring 660SQM approx. With 4 great sized bedrooms and multiple living zones, this family home has space for each member of the family! Ticking all the boxes, being located close to the Hunt club shopping center, Cranbourne Park shopping complex, public transport and parks.
As you walk through the door, the stylish interior, finished to a high standard do not disappoint, offering a spacious front formal lounge, 4 bedrooms (master having ensuite and walk-in robe), natural-light-filled kitchen with all modern conveniences such as 900mm oven, gas cooktop, rangehood, stainless steel dishwasher, loads of cupboards and large pantry with adjoining dining and casual living areas including media/rumpus room all with access to the fantastic extensive undercover concrete aggregate outdoor entertaining space that can be used year-round, with ceiling fan, pebbled garden and side pathway, extensive grassed lawn for kids and pets to play and lush low maintenance gardens.
The remaining 2 bedrooms in their own wing home (both with BIR) are serviced by the central family bathroom with separate toilet and large laundry.
A huge bonus to this impeccable home is the carpeted double garage perfect for a home business with rear sliding door for private access as well as internal access and heating providing many options for this extra room or simply return to normal double garage.
Extras include: remote security/block out shutters, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, security system, solar panels for low bills, pendant lighting and so much more!
Call now to secure your private inspection today!

Description:
STYLISH FAMILY HOME WITH MANY CONVENIENCES!!
Modern and inviting family home located in the popular Carlisle Park Estate offering, many conveniences in location and features!
You will find your basic needs within a walking distance from home. This includes Springhill Shopping Centre, Carlisle Primary and local reserves. Home is also close to Merinda Park Train Station and Cranbourne Shopping Centre.
Fitted with solar panel and solar heated hot-water system, you could save hundreds on bills . The impressive and newly painted interior includes four generous bedrooms, the master with ensuite and walk in robe. There are two spacious open living areas plus a theatre room for entertainment. Enjoy the huge modern kitchen with a massive island bench, dishwasher and stainless steel appliances. From the living room, a lovely alfresco, decking and a low maintenance backyard can be found.
Other features:
1. High ceilings
2. Brand new Window blinds
3. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
4. Split-system reverse cycle air conditioning
5. Solar hot water
6. Landscaped gardens
7. Double remote garage with internal access and rear access
*PHOTO ID REQUIRED UPON INSPECTION*

Description:
Central Cranbourne Living!
***PRIVATE INSPECTION ONLY, PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU ARE WEARING A FACE MASK TO ALL INSPECTIONS***
Prime location! Situated on a huge block of 619 square meters, central to all shopping centres, easy access to highways, surrounded by a beautiful large park and reserves, offering an abundance of opportunities, this home is a renovators delight!
Enjoy the large living area and dining area as you walk through the front door, stunning floorboards and tiles create the beautiful warmth in this home. kitchen, with ample cupboard space, and large windows, overlooking an incredibly impressive undercover alfresco area with a built-in bar and wood fire. Perfect for entertaining guests all year round.
Offering three bedrooms, all freshly painted with built in wardrobes, a central bathroom with a separate toilet, and a large laundry with external access. In addition, you will find a veranda around the whole house, a large 2 car garage and long driveway.
This home is perfect for those who would like to invest, currently tenanted on a month to month basis. Be quick to snatch this beauty, with astounding potential and the enormous block size, this home is an opportunity you won't want to miss!

Location doesn't get much better than this, close to Cranbourne shopping centre, Cranbourne train station and Merinda Park. All this as well as in close proximity to multiple primary schools. This property is a must see for all active buyers!

Description:
Central Unit, So Close To Absolutely Everything
Within 300 metres to the main street of Cranbourne with all its conveniences, such as the Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre with Woolworths and Coles, not to forget Aldi, and all the other shopping, with doctors, schools, buses, cafes, take away foods, all very close by to this partly updated 2 Bedroom unit.
The unit offers a good size lounge room with gas heating and air conditioning, refurbished kitchen with electric cooking that overlooks the living and meals area, there are 2 good size bedrooms with built in robes. separate bathroom, a reasonable size yard and a remote single lockup garage.
Some of the additional features include roller shutters and solar panels.
The unit is superbly positioned and well worth your consideration.

Description:
FULL OF SIMPLE PLEASURES!
On offer for you today is this stylish 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom plus 2 living home. You can make the decision to keep the 2nd living area or transform this space into a study or potentially a 3rd bedroom. The main bedroom is located at the front of the home with full ensuite and walk in robe. The second bedroom has a built in robe and is positioned beside the main bathroom which is also offering separate toilet. The open plan living offers a renovated kitchen with stone bench tops, free stand oven, dishwasher and spacious pantry. Adjacent is the dining area with slide door out and relax in the spacious family room offering split system and gas wall furnace. Other added features include large timber deck with flat roof pergola, 2nd split system in master bedroom and single garage. Central to all that Cranbourne has to offer!
HEALTH PRECAUTIONS FOR INSPECTIONS TO PROTECT BUYERS DUE TO COVID-19:
We are taking necessary precautions to ensure our properties are a safe environment for buyers, including enforcing extra hygiene methods. Our agents are in good health and we will open doors and cupboards for you on request.

Description:
4 BEDROOMS + MASSIVE ENTERTAINMENT ZONE
Loaded with street appeal and meticulously maintained throughout, you've got to see this one!
Comprising 4 bedrooms, ensuite with walk through robe to master, formal living area that opens through to the dining, with the fully appointed kitchen providing ample cupboard and bench space. Adjacent to the dining is a multi-purpose space ideal for work including fitted desk or play with sliding doors leading you to even more! Outside, the property continues to impress! For anyone who loves to relax & entertain - do it in style here, with the decked pool and massive entertainment zone complete with it's own toilet and full built-in bar.
Property Snapshot:
Gleaming polished hardwood floors
Split system heating and cooling
Modern kitchen complete with 900mm cooker
Dishwasher
Plumbed fridge cavity
Decked swimming pool
Entertainment zone complete with toilet & wet bar
Outdoor entertainment area
Exposed aggregate driveway & paths
There's so much more, but you'll have to inspect to see it all!
With all the above on offer you wouldn't expect to be located in such close proximity to multiple major shopping centres, schools (both primary and secondary) and easy access to both Cranbourne train station & Merinda Park train station! But you do and it's all nearby!

Description:
PERFECTLY PRESENTED EX-DISPLAY HOME...MASSIVE LAND!
CRANBOURNE: Live the dream in this perfectly presented ex-display home set on a large land bock measuring 660SQM approx.. With 4 great sized bedrooms and multiple living zones, this family home has space for each member of the family!
Its striking modern home with great attention to detail and everything in its favour!
As you would expect, the stylish interior, finished to a high standard do not disappoint, offering formal lounge, 4 bedrooms (master having ensuite and walk-in robe), study, natural-light-filled kitchen with all modern conveniences, adjoining dining and casual living areas including media/rumpus room. The fantastic extensive outdoor entertaining space that can be used year-round, with rich timber decking, paving, pebbles, striking water feature, lush garden outlook.
Main Features of the property:
- Land: 660 SQM approx..
- Freshly Painted
- Brand New Carpet
- Ex-Display
- 4 Bedrooms
- Master with WIR & ensuite
- 3 Living Areas (Formal lounge, Family/Dinning Plus Rumpus)
- Carpeted Bedrooms & Tiled Wet Areas
- Hardwood Flooring
- Garden Shed
- Side Access
- Double lock-up garage
- Dishwasher: Yes
- Down Lights: Yes
- Ducted Heating: Yes
- Evaporative Cooling: Yes
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/45/60 days.
Centrally Located, Walking distance to all amenities:
-Hunt Club Shopping Centre
-Springhill Shopping Centre
-Casey central Shopping Centre
-Carlisle Park Primary School
-Hunt Club School
-Cranbourne Viking Sports Centre
-Child Care Centres
-Casey race
-Casey Library
-Local G.P.'s located in the Estate.
This family home ticks all the right boxes, so don't waste a minute and give Hardeep Singh a call now to book an inspection.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES.
Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matter.

Description:
"As Good As New Home Next To Train Station"
This 4 bedroom, 2 bathrooms near new home is the perfect start for first home buyers and is a smart investment for astute investors.
Located in a quiet side of Cranbourne with easy access to Melbourne via M1, two minute walk to Cranbourne Train Station and Bus stop, this modern home gives you the best of both worlds.
Main features include:
- Near new home designed to perfection.
- Low maintenance living.
- 4 good sized bedrooms.
- 2 bathrooms, a powder room and separate laundry.
- Open-plan kitchen, dining and spacious living area.
- Low maintenance garden, perfect for BBQ's
- Remote controlled garage with direct access into the property.
- Evaporative Cooling & Ducted Heating.
Close to all the amenities you could need, including Cranbourne Shopping Centre, schools, parks and medical centre, this property is a must see.
Do not miss out on this rare opportunity to get your hands on this excellent property.
For more information and inquiries please call Vikram on 0430392918 or Ajay on 0403351577.
Photo ID is a must.

Description:
SUPERIOR FAMILY HOME
INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT ONLY
When it comes to comfort, space and decadent entertaining opportunities this property leaves nothing to be desired. This is more than a cut above the rest, just come and see!
With a functional and practical floor plan, the home features 3 living areas and 4 well sized bedrooms. The master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe, whilst remaining bedrooms are generously proportioned and complemented by built in robes and the stylish family bathroom.
The centrally appointed kitchen boasts an abundance of both bench and cupboard space with a glass splashback, 900mm as well as a built-in pantry. The kitchen ideally overlooks the family living/dining area, making entertaining and interacting with guests a breeze.
Be just as impressed with the outside, the alfresco is definitely the entertainers delight with plenty of space to enjoy BBQ'S with family and friends all year round!
This fabulous family home offers so many extras:
- Three living areas
- Remote controlled double garage
- Gas Ducted Heating
- Evaporate cooling
- Landscaped front and rear yard
- Alfresco Area
In the sought after Brookland Greens Estate sits this fantastic & modern family home. Surrounded by golf clubs and multiple recreational areas this is the faultless location for the family to get involved in activities. With close proximity to all amenities that Cranbourne has to offer: Cranbourne Shopping Centre, local schools, the beautiful Royal Botanic Cranbourne Gardens and public transport, you don't want to miss out on this one.

Description:
Under Contract
Sophisticated in its renovation and flawlessly finished. This stylish family home would satisfy the fussiest of buyers. Step inside the welcoming front entrance and be met with the open plan living you have been on the lookout for. The gleaming LED downlights throughout will astound and you will immediately be impressed.
Brand new modern white kitchen with subway tiled splashback & stainless steel appliances, looks out across the family and dining areas and boasts easy access to an outdoor pergola for year round outdoor entertaining.
The master suite enjoys a fully renovated ensuite and walk in robe. Other 3 bedrooms are generous in size and serviced with the main bathroom.
Extra Features:
- Ceiling fans in all bedrooms
- Split System
- A large shed
- Outdoor Play Area
- Side Gate
- Lots of parking spaces
With an allotment measuring approximately 747m2, there is an abundance of space in the garden for your enjoyment. Located across the road from the beautiful Monahans Road Reserve and within walking distance to all facilities including train station, primary and secondary schools, Shopping Centre, a wide range of restaurants and recreation.
Be sure to attend the open for inspection, private inspections are also welcome.
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS WELCOME
